title: Vicious and virtuous cycles
description: Self-reinforcing cycles that act as compound growth systems. Negative cycles are vicious, positive cycles are virtuous.

title: Categories of customer attributes
description: Customer attributes can be grouped as demographic, psychographic, geographic, or behavior.

title: The fundamental habits
description: These simple behaviors are often challenging, but provide a rock solid foundation for the rest of life.

title: Blue Ocean
description: Blue oceans are markets that haven't been created yet. They are lucrative business opportunities.

title: Marketing strategy
description: A plan for long-term profit that includes what will be sold, to who, and how.

title: Common traits of successful blue ocean strategies
description: Great strategies have a clear focus, diverge from competition, and are easy to explain.

title: Value curve
description: The line on a strategy canvas showing the emphasis a company places on each factor of competition in its industry.

title: Value innovation
description: Value innovation is how companies offer dramatically higher value at lower costs, escaping competition.

title: Blue Ocean strategy
description: Blue ocean strategy is about creating new markets to escape competition.

title: Factors of competition
description: The factors that companies/products within an industry typically compete on to provide value to customers.

title: The Four Actions framework
description: A tool for identify which competitive factors a business should eliminate, reduce, raise, and create. Typically used with a strategy canvas.

title: The strategy canvas
description: An analytical tool that shows how much emphasis companies place on value areas in their industry.

title: Red ocean
description: Crowded markets where customers have many options to choose from, resulting in cutthroat competition.

title: Value proposition
description: The way(s) a product or service benefits its target customers and the statement describing it.

title: Build infrastructure after not having it becomes painful
Monetized content creation is a compound growth system
Compound growth is most impactful at the end
Positioning statement
description: An explanation of how a product fits into its market.

title: Situation analysis
description: A tool for identifying and evaluating the market conditions for a product or service.
